alert.note: Alert for Kershaw; Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sumter, southeastern Richland and south central Kershaw Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 315 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Eastover, or near McEntire Air Base, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sumter, McEntire Air Base, Shaw Air Base, Eastover, Mulberry, Oakland, Sumter County Airport, Gadsden, Millwood, Dalzell, Dinkins Mill, Wedgewood, Boykin, Cherryvale, Wateree River Correctional Institution, Rembert, Stateburg and Cane Savannah. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central South Carolina.
